name.baseName: Coagulated gum, whole latex, concentrated latex, gross tea, silkworm cocoon (roasted cocoon) ; General bituminous coal ; Hot blast stove prosscess ; All sizes; NESPS2
凝标胶、全乳胶、浓缩乳胶、毛茶、蚕茧（烤茧） ; 一般烟煤 ; 热风炉工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.5

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.5
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了在涉及凝固胶、全乳胶、浓缩乳胶、毛茶、蚕茧（烤茧）生产和处理的工业过程中使用的各种尾气治理污染管理技术。这些过程通过适用于所有规模操作的热风炉技术使用普通烟煤作为燃料。这些技术旨在减少颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）和气态排放，如二氧化硫（SO2）和氮氧化物（NOx），以确保符合空气质量环保标准。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码05,四级代码0514文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为一般烟煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

Pollutant indicator for particulate matter is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas and the pollutant indicator as particulate matter, here it is matched to the most compatible flow in the LCAflow library, the pollutant indicator is noted as particulate matter, and the production coefficient is noted as the production coefficient of soot is expressed in the form of ash content (A%), which is the percentage of coal received by the coal combustion plant (S%), then S=3. ) is the coal combustion received base ash content, expressed in mass percent. For example, if the ash content of the fuel is 15%, then A = 15 The original text describes a production factor of 0.47 A. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the notes after self-calculation.

污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物，产污系数备注为烟尘的产污系数以含灰量(A%)形式表示，其中含灰量(A%)是指燃煤收到基灰分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中灰分含量为15%，则A＝15原文描述的产污系数为 0.47A。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library in the face of the most compatible flow, pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide, pollution coefficient note for sulfur dioxide pollution coefficient in the form of sulfur content (S%), where Sulfur content (S%) is the sulfur content of the fuel, expressed as a mass percentage. For example, if the sulphur content (S%) of the fuel is 3%, then S=3 The production coefficient described in the original article is 16 S. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the notes after self-calculation.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以含硫量(S%)形式表示，其中含硫量(S%)是指燃料硫分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中含硫量(S%)为3%，则S=3原文描述的产污系数为 16S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.6.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.48A。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.48A. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设施年运行时间（小时）/热风炉年运行时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物，产污系数备注为烟尘的产污系数以含灰量(A%)形式表示，其中含灰量(A%)是指燃煤收到基灰分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中灰分含量为15%，则A＝15原文描述的产污系数为 0.48A。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是S12其他（钠碱法），其效率为92.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设施年运行时间（小时）/热风炉年运行时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以含硫量(S%)形式表示，其中含硫量(S%)是指燃料硫分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中含硫量(S%)为3%，则S=3原文描述的产污系数为 17S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
